name: MetalSeadramon
description: MetalSeadramon is an automated armored sea serpent with long flowing hair. It is clad in gold and silver armor with fins protruding out. Its nose houses a cannon barrel with a hexagonal cross-section. Above its head are two horns attached, one on the forehead and another one on the tip of the nose. The horn on the forehead is significantly larger and comes with a knife-like edge at the front. It has two tails ending in a harpoon-like shape.
